articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Just to clarify: we were NOT targeted.
DeFi Pulse 🍇: 🚨 Warning! Some people are getting this notification when connecting to @etherscan or @coingecko.
DO NOT SIGN any transactions that you don't recognize, and keep an eye on this “NFT Apes Win” notification, don't interact with it!
 https://twitter.com/JLRoyal42/status/1525222565278494720
articles.title: Just to clarify: we were NOT targeted.
